headline: Disney's Streaming Base Expands: Can Subscriber Growth Drive Gains?
summary: DIS' streaming base hits 183M in Q3, with rising ARPU, new content and Hulu integration fueling growth momentum.

headline: Webtoon (WBTN) Hits New All-Time High as Disney to Acquire 2% Interest
summary: We recently published 10 Hot Stocks Investors Are Buying, 5 Break Fresh Records. WEBTOON Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:WBTN) is one of the best performers on Tuesday. Shares of Webtoon Entertainment soared for a third consecutive day on Tuesday, to hit a new all-time high as investors cheered The Walt Disney Co.’s acquisition of a 2-percent stake […]

headline: HDI’s Service Management World Announces Keynote Lineup to Inspire the Future of Service and Support
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 17, 2025--HDI, the leading organization dedicated to elevating service and support across the enterprise, today announces the keynote speakers for Service Management World. Service Management World, the #1 event for service management professionals, takes place November 16-20, 2025 at the Disney's Coronado Springs Resort in Orlando, FL. Register here.

headline: Ariel Global Fund Added Walt Disney Company (DIS) Citing Growth Signals
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Global Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The second quarter marked a period of extremes. The stocks fell after the “Liberation Day” tariff announcement in early April and rebounded following the pause in tariff implementation.
